modName: Scary Terry from Rick and Morty
summary: This mod adds Scary Terry (from the new cartoon Rick and Morty) to the marketplace in Riften.
descriptionHtml:
Update: Thanks to readyno from reddit, and Eiries from Skyrim Nexus, I learned that I left the esp file out of my original upload. Sorry for that. It's in there now.

If you're like me, you often find yourself saying, "Why isn't Scary Terry in Skyrim?" I've tried to remedy that with this mod. This is just a taste of the larger Rick and Morty mod that will be done at some point. In the meantime, I encourage you to enjoy this mod, but more importantly, watch Rick and Morty on Adult Swim, because if that show goes off the air I won't have any new characters to put in Skyrim.
author: Cougan
